Class ThreadedPoller<T extends ControllerProperty>

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.comm.ThreadedPoller<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
DevicePoller
Direct Known Subclasses:
CanogaPoller, CapPoller, CBWPoller, ClearGuidePoller, CParkPoller, DinRelayPoller, DmsXmlPoller, DR500Poller, E6Poller, G4Poller, GateNdorV5Poller, IncFeedPoller, MndotPoller, MsgFeedPoller, NdotBeaconPoller, NtcipPoller, OnvifPTZPoller, Org815Poller, RedLionPoller, SierraGxPoller, SierraSshPoller, SS105Poller, SS125Poller, STCPoller, TdcPoller, TransientPoller
public class ThreadedPoller<T extends ControllerProperty> extends Object implements DevicePoller
ThreadedPoller is a class polling devices using a CommThread.
Author:
Douglas Lau, John L. Stanley
